column5: Boho single family home close to campus, shopping, restaurants, airport and medical corridor. Available for short and long term rentals. We do have 2 dogs (although they will not be at the house when rented), so if you have allergies this is probably not the place for you. The house has a lovely backyard, kitchen, dining, living areas, 2 bedrooms with queen size beds and 2 full baths. Includes weekly housekeeping and lawn service.
column8: Lovely Boho, short or long-term rental
